5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and tapered legs.
Fine-knit tube scarf in fluffy yarn containing glittery threads. Width 25 cm, circumference 55 cm.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.

Running set with a hat, gloves and tube scarf in thermal fleece. Gloves with a reflective print and touchscreen-compatible material at the tops of the thumb and index finger. Hat and tube scarf with reflective appliqués.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a brushed finish.

Jacquard-knit T-shirt in a soft viscose blend with slightly wider ribbing around the neckline.
Fully lined bikini top with shaped triangular cups and removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable multiway shoulder straps.
Cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back and an imitation leather appliqué at the front.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frills at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Seam at the waist.
Short jumper in a fine-knit stretch viscose blend. Wide sleeves in a cotton weave with pleats and ribbed cuffs.

Lined bandeau bikini top with lightly padded cups, a square neckline at the front and detachable ties at the back of the neck. Side support, a silicone trim at the top and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Heart-shaped shoulder bag in imitation leather with a glittery finish. Zip at the top and a grosgrain shoulder strap. Lined. Size approx. 13x14 cm.
Body in lace and mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, cups lined with mesh in a contrasting colour and an elasticated seam under the bust. Lined cups with press-studs.

Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem with an appliqué.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a jacquard-knit motif on the turned-up hem.

Wide dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam at the waist. Decorative frills around the neckline, on the front and sleeves and at the hem, and flounced cuffs. Jersey underdress.

Straight-cut dress in an airy, textured weave with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a flounce at the front that runs down the sleeves to the cuffs. Partly lined.

Pyjama shorts in satin with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flounce at the hems.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look/ Lined hood, raised motif on the front, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded, scallop-trimmed cups. Detachable shoulder straps that tie at the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in a patterned weave with a high, smocked collar and short, wide sleeves. Unlined.
Straight-style, knee-length, V-neck dress in a textured weave with tassels, buttons down the front and wide 3/4-length raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Jersey jumpsuit with shimmering metallic stripes. V-neck front and back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist with a drawstring and wide flounce, side pockets and tapered legs. Lined at the top.

Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.

Suit trousers in a softly draping weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and an adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the sides. Zip fly with a concealed button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with an imitation leather appliqué, faux fur pompom on the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
